original_text: The proper time is during the evening of the 14th day of this month. It is when it starts to become dark. That is when you must eat it. You must obey all its rules and its laws.’
korean_text: 그 정한 기일 곧 이 달 열넷째 날 해 질 때에 너희는 그것을 지키되 그 모든 율례와 그 모든 규례대로 지킬지니라

sentences.original_text: The proper time is during the evening
of the 14th day of this month
It is when it starts to become dark
That is when you must eat it
sentences.korean_translation: 그때가 너희가 그것을 먹어야 할 때입니다

sentences.original_text: You must obey all its rules
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그 모든 규정을 지켜야 합니다
